content: always wanted to make baby socks but never daired or maybe just in need of a simple and very fast variatoin these babybooties can be made by absolutely anyone the re simply knitted flat on two straight needles 4 0mm sizes preemie 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months and 18-24 months available in both dutch and english tip knitted botties can be slippery and so they aren t too practical for walking little ones you can easily paint an anti-slip pattern on the sole with some puff paint
